content: chantelle hat by vivian hsu yarn malabrigo mecha 130 yards/100 grams 1 skein i used almost one entire skein for each of my sample hats if you knit this hat at a looser gauge or deviate from the pattern you may want to have an extra skein needles 1 needles that would give you a plush stockinette at 4-4 5 stitches over one inch after blocking i used 5 mm needles and 2 needles two sizes smaller for the ribbing finished dimensions one size 18 circumference by 8 5 high but the stitch pattern is very stretchy and will easily fit most adult heads abbreviations k knit p purl p1b purl into the stitch below the one on the needle c6b slip 3 stitches onto cable needle and hold to the back knit 3 from working needle then knit the 3 stitches on the cable needle right leaning cable c6f slip 3 stitches onto cable needle and hold to the front knit 3 from working needle then knit the 3 stitches on the cable needle left leaning cable k2tog knit two together ssk slip one knitwise slip the next stitch knitwise then knit these two stitches together through the back loop ©2017 vivian hsu p 1/2 directions with smaller needles cast on 84 stitches and join to work in the round work p1 k1 ribbing for 10 rounds or to desired length change to larger needles to work body of hat the next round will be considered round 1 all odd rounds p1 k1 p1 k1 p1 k9 6 times all even rounds except cable cross rounds p1b k1 p1b k1 p1b k9 6 times cable cross rounds rounds 6 18 and 30 p1b k1 p1b k1 p1b k3 c6b 6 times rounds 12 and 24 p1b k1 p1b k1 p1b c6f k3 6 times after completing the last cable round round 30 begin crown decreases you may opt to keep working the rib pattern as long as possible round 31 knit round 32 k4 k2tog k4 ssk k2 6 times 72 stitches round 33 knit round 34 k3 k2tog k4 ssk k1 6 times 60 stitches round 35 knit round 36 k5 ssk k3 6 times 54 stitches round 37 k5 ssk k2 6 times 48 stitches round 38 k2 k2tog k1 ssk k1 6 times 36 stitches round 39 knit round 40 k1 k2tog k1 ssk 6 times 24 stitches round 41 k2tog ssk 6 times 12 stitches cut yarn leaving about 6 inches of tail weave tail through remaining 12 stitches to close the top of the hat weave in all ends on the wrong side block hat if desired make pompon and attach to top of hat ©2017 vivian hsu p 2/2
